mapper.insert: insert into SurveyProcessor(privacyInformationProcessor, privacyInformationProcessorContactPerson, privacyInformationProcessorContactWay, privacyInformationProcessorAddr, contactPersonDuty) value (#{privacyInformationProcessor},#{privacyInformationProcessorContactPerson},#{privacyInformationProcessorContactWay},#{privacyInformationProcessorAddr},#{contactPersonDuty})
